user.title: Choose a name for the Adaptive Lighting
user.description: Every instance can contain multiple lights!

init.title: Adaptive Lighting options
init.description: All settings for a Adaptive Lighting component. The option names correspond with the YAML settings. No options are shown if you have this entry defined in YAML.

data.adapt_color_temp: adapt_color_temp, adapt color temperature using 'color_temp' if supported
data.adapt_rgb_color: adapt_rgb_color, adapt color temperature using RGB/XY if supported
data.initial_transition: initial_transition, when lights go 'off' to 'on' or when 'sleep_state' changes
data.interval: interval, time between switch updates in seconds
data.only_once: only_once, only adapt the lights when turning them on
data.take_over_control: take_over_control, (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED!) if manually adjusting the lights when they are already on
